context: Confluent provides the leading data streaming platform based on Apache Kafka, enabling real-time data pipelines and streaming applications. The company offers both cloud and self-managed solutions.

competitors.name: Amazon Kinesis
competitors.notes: AWS managed streaming service for real-time data processing

competitors.name: Apache Kafka (open source)
competitors.notes: The open-source project that Confluent commercializes and extends

competitors.name: Google Cloud Pub/Sub
competitors.notes: Google's managed messaging service for event-driven systems

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure Event Hubs
competitors.notes: Azure's big data streaming platform compatible with Kafka

competitors.name: Redpanda
competitors.notes: Kafka-compatible streaming platform focused on performance and simplicity

competitors.name: Apache Pulsar
competitors.notes: Open-source distributed messaging and streaming platform

competitors.name: Cloudera
competitors.notes: Enterprise data platform including streaming capabilities

competitors.name: Databricks
competitors.notes: Unified analytics platform with streaming data processing capabilities
